WorkItem.Description: If you create a brand new TypeScript HTML app and try and run it in Firefox 16.0.1 the script does not run and no errors are thrown.  Chrome and IE work just fine.
WorkItem.Summary: Typescript template doesn't work in Firefox

Comments.Message: Yep - sample uses .innerText, which FireFox doesn't support. We'll see if there's a decent fix.

I just blogged a workaround here:

http://guyellisrocks.com/coding/typescript-template-doesn-t-work-in-firefox/

Let me know if that helps.
